name: AdCloser
description:
Made for 0h Game Jam 2020.

Get points by closing ads and other pop-ups.

Game actually ends after some time, dunno when exactly, because it's determined by increasing speed of moving windows and that's too much for me to calculate at 2 AM 3 AM 2 AM.

At least, I think so, because I never got to the end.

Enjoy, I guess.

As usual, HTML version is kinda broken, so I recommend playing Windows version instead, but let's be real, it's not really worth the effort.

Update: Added a post-jam version with some small fixes.
